subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Padraig Harrington won the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Southampton, Bermuda, closing with a four-under 67 for a one-shot win over the United States Open champion Webb Simpson.
snippet: Padraig Harrington won the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Southampton, Bermuda, closing with a four-under 67 for a one-shot win over the United States Open champion Webb Simpson.
